meaning_str.bing:
adv. 显然；可见；看来
网络. 显然地；明显地；表面上

显然；明显地；看起来；表面上；据说；据…所知；据悉；似乎；貌似；看来

1.en: He made those comments at a conference a while back, but apparently he's sticking to his guns.
1.cn: 他不久之前在一个会议上发表了上面的讲话，但是很显然，他还是放不下他的枪。

2.en: With her luggage in her hands, the girl stood looking round in all directions, but apparently no one had come to meet her.
2.cn: 这个女学生提着她的行李，在站台外东张西望，却看不见有接她的人。

3.en: He had planted the trees apparently on an impulse, but it was really the fruition of a dream of his.
3.cn: 他种这些树，显然是出于一时的冲动，但实在也实现了他的一个梦想。

0.en: Yeah, apparently, they're pretty good seats. Yeah.

1.cn: 天哪，为什么？他显然易受惊吓。

2.en: Apparently, whatever they're looking for is in the Ojal prison.
2.cn: 显然，他们要找的东西在欧哈监狱。

3.en: Well, because apparently that's the only way to get your attention.
3.cn: 因为显然那是唯一吸引你注意力的方法。

4.en: Apparently, there is no law of diminishing comedic returns with space poop.
4.cn: 显然，用太空便便做笑点完全无懈可击呢。

5.en: And, apparently, Wil Wheaton's best friend. Sheldon. Talk to the hand.
5.cn: 显然他是威尔·惠顿的死党呢。谢尔顿。懒得鸟你。

6.en: Apparently, if you're Sheldon, all you need to do is turn your back.
6.cn: 显然啊，如果你是谢尔顿的话，你需要做的只是转个身而已。

7.en: But there's a rat problem. Apparently, they're attracted to dryer sheets.
7.cn: 但是现在有老鼠了，它们显然对烘干机里的香料纸感兴趣。

8.en: You see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.
8.cn: 他是个王子，显然，他们在我出生前有个大型仪式。

9.en: Apparently, you did not know that the chef's salad is kitchen trickery to utilize scrap meat.
9.cn: 显然，你不知道推荐沙拉是食堂的杂碎肉骗人把戏。

10.en: What are you doing? I have a craving for white asparagus that apparently is destined to go unsatisfied.
10.cn: 你在干什么？我特别想吃白芦笋，但显然未能如愿。

11.en: Okay. Well, apparently Chandler's angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago.
11.cn: 钱德显然是在气我们2星期前，没帮他买球票。

12.en: Penny laid into me, too. Apparently, I'm overly fixated on premium Swiss chocolate bars.
12.cn: 佩妮也把我骂了一顿。显然，我过分专注在优质的瑞士巧克力棒上。

13.en: Apparently, I'm not artsy enough and have too many legs. So now I'm on Go Fund Yourself.
13.cn: 很显然我不够文艺而且我腿太多，所以我投奔"为自己集资"站了。

14.en: Your brother is being very mysterious about our date tonight. He's a very mysterious guy, apparently.
14.cn: 你哥一直对我们今晚的约会保持神秘。很显然，他是个很神秘的家伙。

15.en: And I didn't hear anything he said after that. Apparently, selling clothes makes us a chick site.
15.cn: 然后他说什么我都听不进去了。显然，服装销售让我们成了一个小妞网站。

16.en: That's a request I can live with. I'm partial to the Kardashians, myself. As apparently as her majesty.
16.cn: 这要求我勉强能接受，我个人更喜欢卡戴珊姐妹，女王陛下显然也是。

17.en: I called the department secretary to see what happened. Apparently, I have a reputation for being obnoxious.
17.cn: 我打电话问学院秘书是怎么回事，显然，全校的人都认为我很讨厌。

18.en: I don't know, but apparently I'm in some kind of relationship, and you seem to be an expert at ending them.
18.cn: 我不知道但显然我陷进某种关系里了，而你似乎很擅长结束这种关系。

19.en: Not they, he. Apparently, that Gorg is last Gorg. That is why rock was so important.
19.cn: 不是他们，是“他”。显然，那个格尔人是最后一个格尔族人了。这就是为什么这块石头那么重要。
